allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: GreenoFig - AI-Powered Health & Wellness Platform

Complete full-stack application featuring:
- User authentication and role-based access control
- Admin dashboard with comprehensive management tools
- Nutritionist dashboard for client management
- AI-powered meal planning and workout generation
- Subscription management with Stripe integration
- Blog system with SEO optimization
- Advanced analytics and reporting
- Real-time chat and messaging

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash("C:\Program Files\Git\usr\bin\ssh.exe" -p 65002 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no u492735793@157.173.209.161 "cd domains/greenofig.com && echo ''=== Deploying Fresh Build ==='' && rm -rf public_html/*.html public_html/assets public_html/*.js public_html/*.css 2>/dev/null && tar -xzf dist-FRESH-BUILD-NOV9.tar.gz -C public_html/ && rm dist-FRESH-BUILD-NOV9.tar.gz && echo '''' && echo ''âœ… FRESH BUILD DEPLOYED!'' && echo '''' && echo ''Deployment timestamp:'' && date && echo '''' && echo ''Files deployed:'' && ls -lh public_html/index.html && echo '''' && echo ''SiteLayout bundle (NEW):'' && ls public_html/assets/SiteLayout* && echo '''' && echo ''HomePage bundle (NEW):'' && ls public_html/assets/HomePage*")

Bash("C:\Program Files\Git\usr\bin\ssh.exe" -p 65002 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no u492735793@157.173.209.161 "cd domains/greenofig.com/public_html && cat > .htaccess << ''HTACCESS_END''
<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>

  RewriteBase /
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d
  RewriteRule ^ index.html [L]
</IfModule>

<IfModule mod_headers.c>
  # Force immediate cache clear - AGGRESSIVE MODE
  Header set Cache-Control ""no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, max-age=0""
  Header set Pragma ""no-cache""
  Header set Expires ""0""
  
  # Add timestamp to force refresh
  Header set X-Deployment-Time ""2025-11-09-16:52:00""
</IfModule>
HTACCESS_END
echo ''âœ… Updated .htaccess with AGGRESSIVE cache clearing''")
